name: Unai Brawler
description:
Local multiplayer party brawler game. Fast gameplay focused on switching weapons. Currently 2-3 players.

Controls:

Left Stick/WASD - Movement

A/Space - Jump

B/Left Shift - Roll

X/Left Click - Light attack

Y/Right Click - Heavy attack

LB/Q - Block

RB/E - Grab/Throw

ESC - Quit

This is a concept I did to practice both Game Design and Unreal Engine. Lots of things missing and everything is WIP. Any feedback is warmly welcome!
